titleStmt.title: Vertue triumphant, or A liuely description of the foure vertues cardinall dedicated to the Kings Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Leighton, William, Sir, fl. 1603-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood, for Matthew Lownes,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: To the Kings Maiestie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
